name: Tomato Soup
keywords: appetizer, main course, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, lentils, tomato
recipeIngredient: 6 ripe tomatoes, blanched, peeled and chopped
1 tablespoon fresh basil, chopped, plus small sprigs for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat and sauté the onion, garlic, and red pepper until tender, about 10 minutes. Add the lentils, basil and thyme and sauté 3 minutes. Add the tomatoes, lemon juice and salt, heat to boiling and simmer 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the vegetable broth and simmer 20 to 30 minutes, until the lentils are soft. If too thin, blend a little hot broth with the tomato paste in a small bowl and stir into soup. Simmer 3 minutes; if thick, add more broth.
Season with basil and Bragg Liquid Aminos and ladle into bowls. Garnish with a sprig of basil.
